$interpreted: Nigel: This path leads deep into the desert.
Naya: We don't know where he is. We need information before we head out.
Angelia: Of course, but who to ask?
Angelia: Such mesmerizing movements. What a dancer!
Lisa: Your compliment is most kind.
Lisa: Would my dear guests like to be entertained?
Nigel: Time is running out, can't wait around.
Lisa: What's the hurry? Dear guests, where are you headed?
Naya: We're about to take down a rascal named Ned.
Lisa: Ned? What's your business with him?
Angelia: Sir Sherlock from the Desert Bazaar.
Angelia: He claimed this Ned fellow stole the Rainbow Roses, and pleaded with us to retrieve it on his behalf.
Lisa: I see...
Nigel: Dancer, do you know where this lowlife lives?
Lisa: Sure do, this Ned has been the talk of the town! Finally, someone's about to teach him a lesson!
Lisa: Head southwest from this point and you'll stumble upon a bandit camp.
Lisa: Ned will be there.
Naya: Time to pay this chump a visit.
Angelia: What are we waiting for? Thank you very much, kind dancer!
Lisa: My pleasure. Don't forget to come watch my next performance~
Fidgety Desert Bandit: Oh no, some hooligans are coming to tear down the roof!
Stupefied Desert Bandit: Bittlebuckets! Where's everybody else?
Fidgety Desert Bandit: All killed...in action!
Stupefied Desert Bandit: How can this be? How many of them?
Nigel: Speak, where's Ned?
Naya: Only these two measly guys left? Knock 'em dead!
Stupefied Desert Bandit: Oww...shucks, that hurt...
Naya: Ok, which one of you is Ned? Hand over the Rainbow Roses.
Stupefied Desert Bandit: Ned Garcia Alznar!? Why would he be here?
Angelia: What? Isn't he one of yours?
Fidgety Desert Bandit: Ned's a desert hunter. We buy cheap meat from him, but that's it.
Fidgety Desert Bandit: That's all we know.
Naya: Hunter? Am I missing something?
Fidgety Desert Bandit: Ned frequents the Northeast hunting grounds. Go look for him there!
Angelia: We've gone completely in the wrong direction.
Nigel: Rotten gypsy dancer was leading us on...what if Sherlock wasn't telling the truth either...
Naya: B-E-A-utiful. What's next?
Nigel: Let's assume the Rainbow Roses are indeed in Ned's possession. Hunting grounds, here we come!
Angelia: Just like that? We injured these innocents, don't we have to take responsibility for this?
Naya: ...*sigh*...they're bandits. We just knocked 'em around, that's all.
Angelia: Are you sure about this...?
Stupefied Desert Bandit: Wait, at least hail a doctor for us!
